Ok, that should be ok. What is the exact output? I'm wondering if the bash says "command not found", meaning that it cant find the script or if the script itself says command not found.

-rw-r--r-- 1 cyrus cyrus 15957213 2005-10-25 18:33 ./install-program.sh
the file isn't executable yet. Do "chmod 0744 ./install-program.sh"
Afterwards do ./install-program.sh
what is the 0744 for
0744 is the oktal value for: Readable,Writeable,Executable for the owner, Readable to group, readable to all others.
